item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dolly Parton
item.description: "The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain!" -- Dolly Parton

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dolly Parton
item.description: "Find out who you are and do it on purpose." -- Dolly Parton

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dolly Parton
item.description: "I tried every diet in the book. I tried some that weren't in the book. I tried eating the book. It tasted better than most of the diets." -- Dolly Parton

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "There is neither happiness nor misery in the world; there is only the comparison of one state with another, nothing more. He who has felt the deepest grief is best able to experience supreme happiness. We must have felt what it is to die, Morrel, that we may appreciate the enjoyments of life. " Live, then, and be happy, beloved children of my heart, and never forget, that until the day God will deign to reveal the future to man, all human wisdom is contained in these two words, 'Wait and Hope." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dolly Parton
item.description: "Storms make trees take deeper roots." -- Dolly Parton

item.title: Melissa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Truvey Jones aka Dolly Parton “Steel Magnolias” 1989
item.description: "Honey, time marches on and eventually you realize it is marchin’ across your face" -- Truvey Jones aka Dolly Parton “Steel Magnolias” 1989

item.title: Melissa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dolly Parton
item.description: "We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails." -- Dolly Parton

item.title: Melissa add a quote by June Carter Cash
item.description: "I'm just trying to matter." -- June Carter Cash

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "I wonder how many people don't get the one they want, but end up with the one they're supposed to be with." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Insane people are always sure that they are fine. It is only the sane people who are willing to admit that they are crazy." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "When your children are teenagers, it's important to have a dog so that someone in the house is happy to see you." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Summer bachelors like summer breezes, are never as cool as they pretend to be." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "[W]hen you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "You always think that a bolt of lightning is going to strike and your parents will magically change into the people you wish they were, or back into the people they used to be." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Well, it was a million tiny little things that, when you added them all up, they meant we were supposed to be together... and I knew it. I knew it the very first time I touched her. It was like coming home... only to no home I'd ever known... I was just taking her hand to help her out of a car and I knew. It was like... magic. - Sleepless in Seattle" -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Some people claim that marriage interferes with romance. There's no doubt about it. Anytime you have a romance, your wife is bound to interfere." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Melissa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare
